title: Issue DMCA Takedown for Pirated Content
description: A movie studio discovers a full-length copy of their new film has been illegally uploaded to YouTube. An agent must issue a DMCA takedown notice.

tasks.description: Identify the URL of the pirated video on YouTube.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the exact URL of the infringing content.

tasks.description: Verify that the uploader is not a legitimate licensee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the uploader has no rights to the content.

tasks.description: Submit a formal DMCA takedown request through YouTube's content protection portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully fills out and submits the DMCA form.
